summary.span: 表示 的表的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of tables for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含所有为特定对象。The contains all the objects for a particular . 访问的，使用属性。To access the of a , use the property. 使用方法，如， ，和来管理集合中的项。The uses methods such as , , and to manage the items in the collection. 使用方法来确定特定表 （由索引或名称指定） 是否在集合中。Use the method to determine whether a particular table (specified by either index or name) is in the collection. 若要从一个表导航到另一个，请使用或属性若要访问的其集合对象。To navigate from one table to another, use the or property of the to access its collection of objects. 你还可以使用属性的父/子关系中导航`DataTables`以特定集合。You can also use the property to navigate through the parent/child relationships of the `DataTables` in a particular collection. ## Examples 此示例中的第一个过程检索的，并输出每个列，每个行，每个表中的值。The first procedure in this example retrieves the of a and prints the value of each column, in each row, of each table. 第二个过程创建一个新具有两列，并将其添加到。The second procedure creates a new with two columns, and adds it to the . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataTableCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTableCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataTableCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTableCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: This type is safe for multithreaded read operations.

threadsafe.span: 你必须同步任何写入操作。

span.span: You must synchronize any write operations.

summary.span: 使用默认名称创建一个新的 对象，并将其添加到集合中。

The newly created .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为未不指定任何名称，`DataTable`使用默认名称，相对于其顺序添加创建的。Because no name is specified, the `DataTable` is created by using a default name, relative to its order of addition. 默认名称是"Table1"。The default name is "Table1." 事件发生时表已成功添加到集合。The event occurs when a table is successfully added to the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例添加三个新对象添加到使用不带参数的方法。The following example adds three new objects to the using the method without arguments. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果任一`null`或空字符串 ("") 传递在中，指定默认名称对新创建`DataTable`。If either `null` or an empty string ("") is passed in, a default name is given to the newly created `DataTable`. 此名称基于表已添加 （"Table1"、"Table2"等） 的顺序。This name is based on the order in which the table was added ("Table1", "Table2", and so on). 如果表已成功添加到集合，则会发生事件。The event occurs if the table is successfully added to the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例添加具有给定名称到。The following example adds a with the given name to the . span.span: if the specified table exists; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的名称对象使用属性。You specify the name of the object by using the property. 如果你添加到具有集合方法，不传递任何参数，表指定一个默认名称，根据表已添加 （"Table1"、"Table2"等） 的顺序。If you add a to the collection with the method, passing no arguments, the table is given a default name, based on the order in which the table was added ("Table1", "Table2", and so on). 若要获取的索引，使用方法。To get the index of a , use the method. > [!NOTE] > 返回`false`时两个或多个表具有相同的名称，但使用不同的命名空间。Returns `false` when two or more tables have the same name but different namespaces. 如果在将表名只匹配到一个表时存在任何二义性，则该调用不会成功。The call does not succeed if there is any ambiguity when matching a table name to exactly one table. ## Examples 下面的示例测试是否具有名称"供应商"的表中存在。The following example tests whether a table with the name "Suppliers" exists in the . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataTableCollection.Contains Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTableCollection.Contains Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataTableCollection.Contains Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTableCollection.Contains Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来确定是否存在具有特定索引的表。Use the method to determine whether a table with a specific index exists. 如果你有一个表，但没有其索引的名称，使用方法以返回的索引。If you have the name of a table, but not its index, use the method to return the index. ## Examples 下面的示例检索按其索引。The following example retrieves a by its index. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果名称存在搜索字符串的大小写完全匹配，它返回的状态。If a name exists that matches the case of the search string, it is returned. 否则不会执行不区分大小写的搜索，并且如果匹配此搜索找到名称，它返回的状态。Otherwise a case-insensitive search is performed, and if a name is found that matches this search, it is returned. 使用方法来确定是否存在具有特定名称或索引的表。Use the method to determine whether a table with a specific name or index exists. ## Examples 下面的示例检索单个表按名称从。The following example retrieves a single table by name from the .
